briefdescription.para: Read the contents of the Standard cFE File Header.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will fill the specified CFE_FS_Header_t variable with the contents of the Standard cFE File Header of the file identified by the given File Descriptor.

listitem.para: The File has already been successfully opened using OS_open and the caller has a legitimate File Descriptor.

parameterdescription.para: File Descriptor obtained from a previous call to OS_open that is associated with the file whose header is to be read.
Pointer to a variable of type CFE_FS_Header_t that will be filled with the contents of the Standard cFE File Header.
Contents of the Standard cFE File Header for the specified file.

entry.para: Any of the return codes specified for OS_lseek or OS_read

briefdescription.para: Initializes the contents of the Standard cFE File Header.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will clear the specified CFE_FS_Header_t variable and initialize the description field with the specified value

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a variable of type CFE_FS_Header_t that will be cleared and initialized

briefdescription.para: Write the specified Standard cFE File Header to the specified file.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will output the specified CFE_FS_Header_t variable, with some fields automatically updated, to the specified file as the Standard cFE File Header. This API will automatically populate the following fields in the specified CFE_FS_Header_t:

listitem.para: SpacecraftID - Filled with the Spacecraft ID
ProcessorID - Filled with the Processor ID
ApplicationID - Filled with the Application ID
TimeSeconds - Filled with the Time, in seconds, as obtained by CFE_TIME_GetTime
TimeSubSeconds - Filled with the Time, subseconds, as obtained by CFE_TIME_GetTime
The File has already been successfully opened using OS_open and the caller has a legitimate File Descriptor.
The SubType field has been filled appropriately by the Application.
The Description field has been filled appropriately by the Application.

parameterdescription.para: File Descriptor obtained from a previous call to OS_open that is associated with the file whose header is to be read.
Pointer to a variable of type CFE_FS_Header_t that will be filled with the contents of the Standard cFE File Header.
Contents of the Standard cFE File Header for the specified file.

entry.para: Any of the return codes specified for OS_lseek or OS_write

briefdescription.para: Modifies the Time Stamp field in the Standard cFE File Header for the specified file.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will modify the timestamp found in the Standard cFE File Header of the specified file. The timestamp will be replaced with the time specified by the caller.

listitem.para: The File has already been successfully opened using OS_open and the caller has a legitimate File Descriptor.
The NewTimestamp field has been filled appropriately by the Application.

parameterdescription.para: File Descriptor obtained from a previous call to OS_open that is associated with the file whose header is to be read.
A CFE_TIME_SysTime_t data structure containing the desired time to be put into the file's Standard cFE File Header.

entry.para: Any of the return codes specified for OS_lseek or OS_write

briefdescription.para: Extracts the filename from a unix style path and filename string.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will take the original unix path/filename combination and extract the base filename. Example: Given the path/filename : "/cf/apps/myapp.o.gz" this function will return the filename: "myapp.o.gz".

listitem.para: The paths and filenames used here are the standard unix style filenames separated by "/" characters.
The extracted filename is no longer than #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN

parameterdescription.para: The filename that is extracted from the path.

entry.para: CFE_SUCCESS if the filename was extracted from the path

briefdescription.para: Determines if a file is a Gzip/compressed file.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API will check the filename and return TRUE if the file is a gzip file. The check is currently based on the filename, so the zipped files should use the ".gz" extention.

listitem.para: A gzipped file will use the ".gz" filename extention.

entry.para: TRUE if the file has the ".gz" extention and FALSE otherwise.
